imdb.plot outline: In this series follow Chris Young and his co-hosts around the US as they show you how to live life fully on a budget or "balling out". Comparing the best of each city in entertainment, food, and culture, Chris uses his background as journeyman, influencer, entrepreneur, and chef to share his views on what he believes is the best way to experience each destination.
imdb.title: Budget or Baller
plot: _Budget or Baller_ (qv) follows Chris and his friends as they discover new destinations and showcase the best of different cities in food and entertainment on both a budget, and with a limitless budget.::PR

In this series follow Chris Young and his co-hosts around the US as they show you how to live life fully on a budget or "balling out". Comparing the best of each city in entertainment, food, and culture, Chris uses his background as journeyman, influencer, entrepreneur, and chef to share his views on what he believes is the best way to experience each destination.::PR
